column1: #Text=I 'm supposed to master all four elements before that comet arrives .
#Text=You pretty much mastered airbending and that only took you a hundred and twelve years .
#Text=I 'm sure you can master three more elements by next summer .
#Text=" Aang says : " I have n't even started waterbending and we 're still weeks away from the North Pole .
#Text=" Katara says : " Calm down , it 's going to be okay .
#Text=If you want , I can try to teach you some of the stuff I know .
#Text=" Katara says : " We 'll need to find a good source of water first .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Maybe we can find a puddle for you to splash in .
